Re Followup on Performance Feedback Training Cc attachement noted below Andrea Yowman AM To Steven J nron Cindy NRON cc Brian NRON Sharon NRON Michelle CT Subject Followup on Performance Feedback Training Steve and Cindy Brian Sharon Michelle and I met today to discuss the strategy for Performance Feedback Training and decided on the following The presentation should be updated to reflect the PRC process relative ranking and preferred distribution attached Brian Schaffer will complete the Houston training sessions next week The HR Community within the BUs need to be trained and armed with information to better address questions and concerns from Managers Supervisors and employees on the process A Mandatory global HR trainingmeeting should be held Tuesday January th and kicked off by Steve Kean and Cindy Olson Brian will prepare an invite communication Probably at the Double Tree or Hyatt and other locations video tele conference An eSeak should be held week of January th on Performance Management The HR Heads should send out a separate communication to their people to reinforce attendance to this meetingtraining A separate communication should be sent out to employees and Superviors below Manager on the PRC process Brian will prepare a draft of the communication Please give us your thoughts on this approach You can contact Brian Michelle Sharon or me if you have specific questions ay

VP Commercial Support PRC Location Change EB C and Time Change am Cc Attached is the current listing of the VPs who will be reviewed on Friday To accommodate several requests the VP Commercial Support PRC meeting has been changed to EBC and will begin at am Please note Fernley Dyson will be video conferencing from London and Rod Hayslett will be teleconferencing ay ext

VP Commercial Support PRC SubCommittee Cc SENT ON BEHALF OF WES COLWELL You have been selected to participate on the VP Commercial Support PRC SubCommittee to cross calibrate and rate the Commercial Support Vice Presidents This PRC will be held on July in EB C You will be responsible for representing Vice Presidents in your functional area andor business unit The attached file details specifically the employees we are requesting that you represent Two weeks prior to the meeting you will receive the following information to facilitate your preparation Employee Profile Consolidated Feedback List of Accomplishments Functional vs Business Unit Ranking Differences You should discuss the performance of these Vice Presidents with their manager and resolve any issues based on feedback received prior to attending this meeting The results of this committee will be reviewed and approved by the VP PRC Committee on July If you have any questions or concerns please dont hesitate to contact me at ext Wes Colwell

RE FollowUp on OFCCP Meeting Cc Thanks Original Message From Kean Steven J Sent Tuesday November PM To Lighthill Sandra Cash Michelle Cc Yowman Andrea Subject RE FollowUp on OFCCP Meeting Michelle can you respond I havent seen anything Also after our meeting we had talked about making a proposal to them specifically we were at least going to describe the actions we took so they might have the opportunity to acknowledge that we had done enough I know everyone is busy but I would like us to get ahead of this while we have a good environment for resolution Original Message From Lighthill Sandra Sent Tuesday November PM To Cash Michelle Kean Steven J Cc Yowman Andrea Subject FollowUp on OFCCP Meeting Michelle and Steve Have we received the letter from the OFCCP regarding the closing of the Corporate Management Review This is the letter we are expecting as a result of your meeting in Washington DC with the OFCCP about weeks ago Should I contact Rosalee Fleming since the letter could have gone to Ken Lay Can you please let me know Thanks so much Regards Sandra

FW The Daily Motivator Thankful for it all Mr Lay Just a note of Thanks I know you are working hard to get us through all of this stuff So thanks for being here for us I get the following Daily Motivator compliments of Cindy Olson and it seemed appropriate for what we are going through Original Message From Ralph Marston Image Express IncENRON Sent Tuesday November AM To Yowman Andrea Subject The Daily Motivator Thankful for it all THE DAILY MOTIVATOR Tuesday November Thankful for it all Have you ever considered that perhaps your difficulties come to you precisely because you need them because of what they can teach you because of how they will compel you to grow Imagine what would happen if you could look at your troubles not as some sort of cruel and random punishment but rather as a potent form of empowerment Do you resent the difficulties in your own life Why What purpose does that resentment serve There is nothing of value that it will bring you Resenting your troubles only makes them more troubling It only brings you down even more On the other hand finding a way to appreciate those problems will help them become a positive force in your life Gratitude will move your life positively forward not only when youre grateful for your blessings but also when youre grateful for your troubles Find a way to be genuinely thankful for it all and the reality of your life will reflect that positive and empowering focus Ralph Marston This is the Daily Motivator email edition Copyright C Ralph S Marston Jr All rights reserved Visit The Daily Motivator web site at for an archive of more than daily messages inspirational photos and more For subscription changes or if you ever fail to receive a daily email message from The Daily Motivator please go to subonlysubloginhtml and log in using the subscription address listed below Your subscription address is

Re Internal Feedback for PRC Cc Sally Based on Ricks response I can arrange to add addtional names for you to provide feedback I will also leave Rick a voice mail ay From Sally Beck ECT PM To Richard NRON cc Andrea NRON Subject Internal Feedback for PRC I have completed internal feedback forms through the PEP system for Brent Price Bob Hall and Peggy Hedstrom Those appeared to be the only names that you included for which you wanted my input Somehow from Andreas voice mail message last week I had anticipated responding to more requests I thought perhaps input in working with Wes within ENA or Melissa on SAP Those werent on my list within the PEP system so I just wanted you to know that I have responded to the three that were there If there was intent for me to respond to any others they werent accessible in the system Believe me I am not asking for more just wanted to be sure that what I saw in PEP as a request matched your expectations in terms of my response Sally

Re Internal Feedback for PRC Cc Sally Based on Ricks response I can arrange to add addtional names for you to provide feedback I will also leave Rick a voice mail ay From Sally Beck ECT PM To Richard NRON cc Andrea NRON Subject Internal Feedback for PRC I have completed internal feedback forms through the PEP system for Brent Price Bob Hall and Peggy Hedstrom Those appeared to be the only names that you included for which you wanted my input Somehow from Andreas voice mail message last week I had anticipated responding to more requests I thought perhaps input in working with Wes within ENA or Melissa on SAP Those werent on my list within the PEP system so I just wanted you to know that I have responded to the three that were there If there was intent for me to respond to any others they werent accessible in the system Believe me I am not asking for more just wanted to be sure that what I saw in PEP as a request matched your expectations in terms of my response Sally

Followup from the Houston CEO Diversity Roundtable Cc Sally I am currently working with Cindy Olson and Kelly Kimberly in the diversity area of which Ken Lay has asked to put renewed emphasis on Mr Lay participates in the Houston CEO Diversity Roundtable which consist of of Houstons largest corporations On October th Cindy Kelly and I met with Gerald Smith of Smith Graham Company Robert Carter of The Enterprise Group and Willie Alexander of WJ Alexander Associates as a followup to a recent meeting Mr Lay and Cindy attended These gentlemen represent a coalition of Houston relatively large minority professional services firms who are looking to bring additional value to Enron and expand their footprint in some of the larger Houston area companies According to Cindy the goal is for Enron to be a pilot in utilizing some of these professional services firms My plan is to conduct due diligence on these organzations prior to making formal recommendations to the Management Committee The purpose of this note is to seek your assistance in scheduling some time with you and Robert Carter of The Enterprise Group to identify opportunities to provide support services Cindy Olson ask that I set this meeting up with you asap Mr Carter currently does business with Enron and I would be interested in getting feedback on the services The Enterprise Group currently provides I have requested the following from Mr Carter meeting objective agenda amount of time needed attendees and options on dates and time If you schedule permits please have your assistant coordinate this meeting with JoAnn Matson my assistant Thanks for your help Andrea List below is his response Meeting Objective Identify opportunities for ESC to provide business process support services to Enron Wholesale Agenda Overview of ESC Capabilities ESC Discussion of EWSs Business Process Support Needs EnronEWS Explanation of Enrons Initiative to Increase the Use of Minority Professional Services Firms EnronAndrea Yowman Plan of Action Group Amount of time needed minutes Attendees Paul Kleinen and Robert Carter Enterprise Services Company Options on date and time MondayNov th thru FridayNovth AM or PM If neither of these dates work for you and Sally please provide us with your available dates and we will make it happen This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

into the HR repository tomorrow Please let Kathy Schultea and myself know immediately the name of your one point of contact for each BU andor function Kathy Schultea will notify them when the report has been put into the repository You should begin validating your participant list on Monday September th Kathy or a member of her staff wil be available should you need assistance in generating your individual reports I can be reached at should you have questions ay Richard Amabile PM To Marla BarnardEnron nron Communications Robert NRON Janie BonnardENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Scott GilchristENRON YeagerEnron nron Communications Gary CT Mike NRON Joe nron Michael R CT Craig ES Mary NRON Marie NRON Jennifer NRON Fred CT Bryan CT Chris CT Louise CT Subject The Pulse Distribution List Schedule As you know Andrea Yowman will be coordinating the distribution lists for the Pulse survey in October Attached is the most up to date schedule that she has generated as a basis for working on those lists I am suggesting she send the lists to the HR head for each group so that you can decide whom you want to review and approve them As mentioned in my earlier email to you please contact Andrea directly with any questions you may have about the lists including how to separate out those who will receive paper and pencil how to handle those not on electronic distribution systems etc Dick Amabile

RE PRC File Cc Thanks Original Message From Goode Diane Sent Tuesday October PM To Yowman Andrea Cc Cash Michelle Subject PRC File Kathy Schultea called Shes been trying to send the file for over an hour Her system locked up Shell resend I have her cell in case we need her assistance I have the password Thanks

RE MidYear PRC Data Cc Kathy Just got a call from Diane Goode who is waiting for the consolidated data When can this be provided or is there someone else who can assist Thanks ay Original Message From Schultea Kathryn Sent Monday October AM To Yowman Andrea Goode Diane Cc Cash Michelle Subject RE MidYear PRC Data Sensitivity Confidential Ill be providing you these files today Original Message From Yowman Andrea Sent Monday October AM To Goode Diane Cc Cash Michelle Schultea Kathryn Subject RE MidYear PRC Data Sensitivity Confidential Hi Diane The attached files are Business Objects reports and should be converted to excel by Kathy Schultea Kathy should be adding the HR employees and then the files should go directly with Jeanneret No need to copy me on the files due to confidentiality of HR data You can just let me know the files went Thanks ay Original Message From Goode Diane Sent Monday October AM To Cc Cash Michelle Yowman Andrea Subject MidYear PRC Data Importance High Sensitivity Confidential File Diversity Mid Year Download for calculating Standard deviationrep File Diversity Mid Year Download for calculating Standard deviation expatsrep Mr Jeanneret I am forwarding these file at Michelle Cashs request After you have received and opened these files please call Michelle Cash to discuss the types of analyses we would like to have performed on the data Michelle Cashs direct number is If you have any problems with the attachments please contact me at the number below Diane Goode Senior Specialist Enron North America Smith Street EB Houston TX fax Diane nroncom Privileged and Confidential Prepared in Anticipation of Litigation

RE Need your legal expertiseI like that idea How about going down to Director level I have started maintaining a list of people who have expressed an interest in diversity regardless of gender or ethnicity and will also include their names ay Original Message From Cash Michelle Sent Monday October PM To Yowman Andrea Subject RE Need your legal expertise Andrea I appreciate your protection Why not give them the names of several individuals who would be supportive of those events including Hispanic VPs as well as others who have expressed an interest in diversity initiatives Plus you could include some people who are not VPs per se but may be attorneys Coralina Rivera comes to mind or other fairly senior level personnel That way you are not necessarily revealing the diverstiy information but are providing them with a great set of resources Do you think that will work If not then I wouldnt have too much heartburn about giving them the names I just think that the prior approach would be better Michelle Original Message From Yowman Andrea Sent Mon PM To Cash Michelle Cc Subject Need your legal expertise Hi Michelle I had a meeting today with Kelly Kimberly Misha Siegal Calvin Eakin Jennifer Medcalf Lauren Iannarone to share information about diversity initiatives There are several Hispanic events where GSS would like to invite representation at the senior level along with key vendors and the only person they are aware of is Dennis Vegas I was asked to identify senior level hispanics so that the invitations can be extended to them I came up with hispanic VPs Can I share those names with GSS I would actually like to have a few guidelines on what to share and what not to share Im pretty protective of HR information but want to be extra cautious Thanks ay Andrea Yowman Enron Corp

FW Super Saturday Questionnaire Oct Ready for testingPer our conversation I would appreciate your input on the questions from a legal perspective Thanks for your help Original Message From Yowman Andrea Sent Wednesday October PM To Warner Traci Cc Coleman Jacqueline Jones Donna Walt John Brown Milton Subject Super Saturday Questionnaire Oct Ready for testing wipiasp Attached is the URL to test the questionnaire Please review the content for consistency I would like to complete any final changes today We will do our finalfinal walkthru at the hotel on Friday Once I clear the test responses you will be live and will not want anyone going into the survey to play Thanks ay

RE MidYear PRC Results for HR Cc No problem I will send you the file and Kathy the information shortly ay Original Message From Cash Michelle Sent Wednesday October PM To Yowman Andrea Wright Teresa Cc Joyce Mary Subject RE MidYear PRC Results for HR Andrea I have talked this issue over with Mary and Kathy Apparently the HR info is limited significantly and there is sensitivity over keeping HR RE Diversity Points Presentation Cc Although the focus of this exercise relates to people I recommend we have a slide that shows the bigger picture of diversity areas within the Enron organization For example Minority Vendors Community Relations Human Capital Compliance Social Responsibility etc Original Message From Cash Michelle Sent Sunday September PM To Mintz Jordan Donahue Jeff Yowman Andrea Cc Olson Cindy Tilney Elizabeth McDaniel Kirk Subject RE Diversity Points Presentation Jordan I think this looks good There is one other area that you may want to include Develop relationships with governmental agencies that enforce discriminationaffirmative action laws regulations and Executive Orders I have been taking the lead on this with support from Steve Kean and Cindy but we are just starting the effort this month Steve and I will meet with the Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs this week and I am hoping to meet with the head of the OFCCP and perhaps folks with EEOC in Washington later in the month I believe that cordial cooperative relationships with these agencies can be invaluable in our diversity efforts If you choose to include this activity it probably would belong in the Communication or Resources sections it could be included in the section on creation of external relationships Let me know if you have any questions Michelle Original Message From Mintz Jordan Sent Tue PM To Donahue Jeff Yowman Andrea Cash Michelle Cc Olson Cindy Tilney Elizabeth McDaniel Kirk Subject FW Diversity Points Presentation Attached is the revised summary of the recommendations coming out of the Diversity Subcommittee If there are additional comments please feel free to pass them on Is is also my understanding that Jeff is working with Andrea and Michelle regarding the metrics accumulated with respect to diversity performance with a focus on verification context and presentation so as to supplement our recommendations In that regard and after discussing with Kirk we should begin organizing a formal presentation for the OTC of these materials One approach may be as follows Convert the Recommendations and Metrics into approximately slides a Slide Overview b Slide What type of data was used as support and why c Slide Presentation of the metrics and what we believe that data is indicating d Review of RecommendationsAction Items and the supporting Business Case and e Next Steps Identify and present key metrics identify backup slides with data points I am hopeful that we can finalize these items in the next week so we can review with Cindy in early October and be prepared to meet with the OTC sometime in October Please let me know your thoughts and suggestions Thank you for your time Jordan Original Message From Forsyth Darlene C Sent Tuesday September PM To Mintz Jordan Subject Diversity Points Presentation Diversity Points Culture Committeedoc

RE CEO Diversity Roundtable PreparationGreat I wanted to get your thoughts on articulating the HR Risk Management area I will plug in your points and we can fine tune tomorrow ay Original Message From Cash Michelle Sent Saturday October PM To Yowman Andrea Subject RE CEO Diversity Roundtable Preparation Hi Andrea I think this captures most everything on Jordans slide it looks good One thought I kind of believe that the bullet on governmental relationships may not really be compliance as it is more of what Keans group would do If we are going to have a heading called compliance then I believe that we should add bullets on updating publicizing and striving for AAP targets audits of compensation at all levels which is where the OFCCP audit came from audits of other employment practices eg staffing PRC promotions layoffs etc risk management processes in termination of employment and other related items This should be a combination of compliance government relations and legal Perhaps we call is HR Risk Mitigationmanagement instead I dont really have the answerscontext so it may not be appropriate Thanks for the opportunity to comment Michelle Original Message From Yowman Andrea Sent Sat PM To Olson Cindy Yowman Andrea Kimberly Kelly Donahue Jeff Cash Michelle Mintz Jordan Cc Subject CEO Diversity Roundtable Preparation Dear all Attached is a draft document titled Enron Diversity Overview It is a consolidation of the major diversity efforts at Enron If you are aware of other diversity efforts please let me know The first two areas listed have been the focus of the Diversity SubCommittee I have requested an update from the owners of the other areas and hope to have this updated by our pm meeting Community Relations Misha Siegel for Elyse Kalmans Enron Investment Partners Barbara Paige for Kevin Garland Minority Women Business Development Calvin Eakin Jennifer Medcalf Social Responsibility Lauren Iannarone BU Efforts Kalen Pieper Robert Jones Enron Diversity Overviewdoc Andrea Yowman Enron Corp
